long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
word clock is a tiny little extension for chrome. tell the time with a click.
incredibly simple and super easy to use. pin word clock in the chrome extensions bar for the best experience.
time is given in the form of "it's [hour] [minute] on [day], [month] [day of month].", in lowercase, as in "it's four thirty on monday, january first."
